## Sample 3D Plot


```{r, comment="", message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(plotly)
library(datasets)
data(mtcars)
mtcars %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~wt,
          y = ~mpg,
          z = ~hp,
          color = ~disp,
          colors = "Oranges",
          type = "scatter3d",
          mode = "markers")
```
